insert into used_product values( seq_used_product_no.nextval, #{sellerId}, #{cateNo}, #{productTitle}, #{productContent}, #{productImg1}, #{productImg2}, #{productImg3}, #{productImg4}, #{productImg5}, #{productPrice}, #{productLocation}, #{productDeliveryFee}, 0, null, null, default, default, default )
select seq_used_product_no.currval from dual
mapper.select: select last_number from user_sequences where sequence_name = 'SEQ_USED_PRODUCT_NO'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, p.* from ( select product_no, seller_id, cate_no, product_title, product_content, product_img1, product_img2, product_img3, product_img4, product_img5, to_char(product_price, 'FM99,999,999') ||'원' as product_price, product_location, product_delivery_fee, round((sysdate-product_enroll_time)*24*60) as product_enroll_time, product_views, transaction_date, buyer_id, is_delete, heart from used_product where is_delete='N' and transaction_date is null order by product_enroll_time asc ) p ) where rnum between nvl(#{start}, 0) and nvl(#{end}, 10) order by product_enroll_time asc
select cate_name from category where cate_no=#{cate_no}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select p.product_no, p.seller_id, p.cate_no, p.product_title, p.product_content, p.product_img1, p.product_img2, p.product_img3, p.product_img4, p.product_img5, to_char(product_price, 'FM99,999,999') ||'원' as product_price, p.product_location, p.product_delivery_fee, round((sysdate-product_enroll_time)*24*60) as product_enroll_time, p.product_views, p.transaction_date, p.buyer_id, p.is_delete, p.heart, m.member_id from used_product p, member m where p.seller_id = m.member_id and cate_no=#{cateNo} order by
p.product_enroll_time desc to_number(p.product_views) desc to_number(p.product_price) asc to_number(p.product_price) desc
p.product_enroll_time desc
) a ) where rnum between nvl(#{start},1) and nvl(#{end},20)

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select p.product_no, p.seller_id, p.cate_no, p.product_title, p.product_content, p.product_img1, p.product_img2, p.product_img3, p.product_img4, p.product_img5, to_char(p.product_price, 'FM99,999,999') ||'원' as product_price, p.product_location, p.product_delivery_fee, round((sysdate-p.product_enroll_time)*24*60) as product_enroll_time, p.product_views, p.transaction_date, p.buyer_id, p.is_delete, p.heart, m.nickname from used_product p, member m where p.seller_id = m.member_id
and p.product_title Like '%' || #{productTitle} || '%'
and m.nickname Like '%' || #{nickname} || '%'
order by
p.product_enroll_time desc to_number(p.product_views) desc to_number(p.product_price) asc to_number(p.product_price) desc
p.product_enroll_time desc
) a ) where rnum between nvl(#{start},1) and nvl(#{end},20)

select count(0) from used_product p, member m where p.seller_id = m.member_id
and p.product_title Like '%' || #{productTitle} || '%'
and m.nickname Like '%' || #{nickname} || '%'

select product_no, seller_id, cate_no, product_title, product_content, product_img1, product_img2, product_img3, product_img4, product_img5, to_char(product_price, 'FM99,999,999') ||'원' as product_price, product_location, product_delivery_fee, round((sysdate-product_enroll_time)*24*60) as product_enroll_time, product_views, transaction_date, buyer_id, is_delete, heart from used_product where product_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update used_product set heart=heart+1 where product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.delete: delete from wish_product where product_no=#{productNo} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.update: update used_product set heart=heart-1 where product_no=#{productNo}

select count(*) from used_product where seller_id = (select member_id from member m join used_product u on (m.member_id = u.seller_id) where product_no = #{productNo})

select product_no, product_title, product_content, product_img1, product_price, to_char(product_enroll_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') product_enroll_time from used_product where seller_id = #{memberId} and is_delete = 'N' order by product_enroll_time desc
select count(*) from used_product where seller_id = #{memberId}
